post.text: Khizr Khan, father of a fallen Muslim American hero: "I want to ask Mr. Trump: Would my son have a place in your America?"

comment.author: Nickolaus
comment.text: such a beautiful father .....my heart aches for this man ....his son died for America and his friends ....where were Trump's sons ??? hunting and killing animals??? playing golf??? dealing wheeling in the casinos??? Does Trump have any religion ? how dare he discriminate American people based on their religion and ethnic backgrounds ...or any people ....such a hypocrite man !!!!!

replies.author: Nickolaus
replies.text: no money will replace his son...they should pay him much more ....I am glad he is talking about this and take Trump to the mud !!!!

replies.author: Brieana
replies.text: FREEDOM LOVING AMERICANS ARE #NOTWithHER BECAUSE WE ARE #StrongerWITHOUTHer! AND MUCH #SaferAFERWITHOUTHer! YES WE ARE! #NEVERHillary! #LOCKHerUP! #TRUMPPENCE2016! #MakeAmericaGREATAgain! ☆☆☆☆☆DONALD 4 PRESIDENT☆☆☆☆☆

replies.author: Cassidy
replies.text: Only Hypocrite is Mr. Kahn The Muslim brotherhood gave him a award Sept 3. Rosemont Illinois. 10,000 members.They said his wife's 7 minutes of silence was effective. That speech was planned by them c span.
